name: Tigey's Gift
description:
"When you have an unfortunate life, you better create a phantom, love her, glory her and feed her with biscuits in your imagination, defend her with your life. This is how we remember our kitty Tigey with cerebellar hypoplasia only lived 8 months. We want to present you a best kitty a family could have and how she lived and saved our lives. Would you like to take a sit with a cup of coffee with us and pet Tigey?"

Tigey's Gift is a mini game from game developer(me) to show his love to cats he had in the past years.
I made this game to help my wife and I not to drown in sorrow, to accept the loss of our special friend, Tigey. She will never grow up but she will stay in my memory and this game or some other people who know her story.

It's a game based on real story with short films and addictive PING PONG arcade puzzle game rather than a walking simulator type.

Feature
- Addictive and replayable Arcade puzzle game.
Shoot 5 different balls to feed the cat with tuna, catnip, love, toys and water. Essential things for all cats.
Game will be harder if you have better skill.
Trigger passive rewards to win more score.
- Try to beat your score every time you play.
- Short times to play: You only need to spend 20 minutes every turn.
- Reasonable but tough achievements are waiting for your challenge!
- Discover the story about Tigey.
Beat the score to unlock more stories. Stay with Tigey and accompany her in her trip.
Short films about the story of kitty Tigey.
